Articles.Content:
LLR-19 Aircraft

The LLR-19 Aircraft is a big, heavy, long distance jet. Great for carrying anything you need there and back, great for long distance capsule pickups.

http://www./download/o2u5jfgrqfqcdb1/LLR-19.craft

The KIDA - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39029-KIDA-Kerbal-Interplanetary-Defense-Administration

The KUAAA - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39055-Hiring-Modded-Stock-Kerbal-Union-Aero-Astronautical-Association

Mad Scientists shouldn't say things like.. And I quote "Intake-spam much?"

Mad Scientists should say things like, I see you have taken advantage of the air intakes, I think perhaps you need more.

You should be ashamed of yourself.

Edited July 8, 2013 by KissSh0t
should = shouldn't
No such thing as too many intakes, you can always go higher, besides, you need to to get this bus up to any decent speed

Mad Scientists should say things like.. And I quote "Intake-spam much?"

Mad Scientists should say things like, I see you have taken advantage of the air intakes, I think perhaps you need more.

You should be ashamed of yourself.

It's my day off. I get to be normal once in a while.

BWAHAHAHAHA!

It's my day off. I get to be normal once in a while.

BWAHAHAHAHA!

It's a mad normal person! Everybody, RUN!
I dare to say, that this thing won't fly. Do you have any screenshots to prove me wrong?
Hard as heck to get off the ground, but trust me, it flies
You were using the radial scoops, are you mad? They are ugly and are less efficient to mass/drag than ram ones which are still hideous.
I Didn't have anywhere else to put ram intakes
